mapper.insert: INSERT INTO classroom (name, capacity, status) VALUES (#{name}, #{capacity}, #{status})
mapper.select: SELECT id, name, capacity, status FROM classroom
SELECT status, COUNT(*) as count FROM classroom GROUP BY status
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') as date, COUNT(DISTINCT classroom_id) as used_count FROM course_schedule WHERE create_time >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 7 DAY) GROUP BY date

SELECT ROUND(COUNT(DISTINCT cs.classroom_id) * 100.0 / COUNT(DISTINCT c.id), 2) as rate FROM classroom c LEFT JOIN course_schedule cs ON c.id = cs.classroom_id WHERE cs.create_time >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 30 DAY)
SELECT c.name, COUNT(cs.id) * 100.0 / (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM time_slot) as usage_rate FROM classroom c LEFT JOIN course_schedule cs ON c.id = cs.classroom_id GROUP BY c.id, c.name
SELECT c.name, AVG(cs.student_count * 100.0 / c.capacity) as utilization_rate FROM classroom c LEFT JOIN course_schedule cs ON c.id = cs.classroom_id GROUP BY c.id, c.name
